001import javax.swing.*;
002import java.awt.*;
003import java.awt.event.*;
004import java.net.URL;
005import java.awt.image.*;
006
007/**
008 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a text entry
009 * area, a text output area and an optional image.
010 * 
011 * @author HOUEE Adrien
012 * @version 22-11-21
013 */
014public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
015{
016    /**
017     * Un moteur de jeu à portée privée
018     */
019    private GameEngine aEngine;
020    
021    /**
022     * Une JFrame à portée privée
023     */
024    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
025    
026    /**
027     * Un JTextField à portée privée
028     */
029    private JTextField aEntryField;
030    
031    /**
032     * Une JTextArea à portée privée
033     */
034    private JTextArea  aLog;
035    
036    /**
037     * Un JLabel à portée privée
038     */
039    private JLabel     aImage;
040
041    /**
042     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
043     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
044     * needed.
045     * 
046     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
047     */
048    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
049    {
050        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
051        this.createGUI();
052    } // UserInterface(.)
053
054    /**
055     * Print out some text into the text area.
056     * 
057     * @param pText Text
058     */
059    public void print( final String pText )
060    {
061        this.aLog.append( pText );
062        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
063    } // print(.)
064
065    /**
066     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
067     * 
068     * @param pText Text
069     */
070    public void println( final String pText )
071    {
072        this.print( pText + "\n" );
073    } // println(.)
074
075    /**
076     * Show an image file in the interface.
077     * 
078     * @param pImageName Image path
079     */
080    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
081    {
082        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
083        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
084        if ( vImageURL == null )
085            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
086        else {
087            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
088            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
089            this.aMyFrame.pack();
090        }
091    } // showImage(.)
092
093    /**
094     * Enable or disable input in the input field.
095     * 
096     * @param pOnOff enable or disable
097     */
098    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
099    {
100        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
101        if ( ! pOnOff ) { // disable
102            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
103            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
104        }
105    } // enable(.)
106
107    /**
108     * Set up graphical user interface.
109     */
110    private void createGUI()
111    {
112        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "Dem Bones SB" ); // change the title
113        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
114
115        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
116        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
117        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
118        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
119        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
120        
121        JButton vBtnHelp = new JButton("Help !");
122
123        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
124        this.aImage = new JLabel();
125
126        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
127        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
128        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
129        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
130        vPanel.add( vBtnHelp, BorderLayout.EAST );
131
132        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
133
134        // add some event listeners to some components
135        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
136        vBtnHelp.addActionListener(new ActionListener(){  
137            public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e){  
138                aEngine.interpretCommand("help");
139            }  
140        });  
141
142        // to end program when window is closed
143        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener( new WindowAdapter() {
144            public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) { System.exit(0); }
145        } );
146
147        this.aMyFrame.pack();
148        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
149        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
150    } // createGUI()
151
152    /**
153     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
154     * 
155     * @param pE ActionEvent
156     */
157    public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
158    {
159        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
160        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
161        this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
162    } // actionPerformed(.)
163
164    /**
165     * A command has been entered. Read the command and do whatever is 
166     * necessary to process it.
167     */
168    private void processCommand()
169    {
170        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
171        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
172
173        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
174    } // processCommand()
175} // UserInterface
